name: walletList
description: This endpoint lists all e-wallets in descending order of creation.

WalletListRequest.description: WalletListRequest defines the request schema for `/wallet/list`

count.description: The number of e-wallets to fetch

cursor.description: A base64 value representing the latest e-wallet that has already been requested. Set this to `next_cursor` received from the previous `/wallet/list` request. If provided, the response will only contain e-wallets created before that e-wallet. If omitted, the response will contain e-wallets starting from the most recent, and in descending order.

APIClientID.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.
APIClientID.title: ClientID

WalletISOCurrencyCode.description: An ISO-4217 currency code, used with e-wallets and transactions.
WalletISOCurrencyCode.title: ISO Currency Code

APISecret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.
APISecret.title: APISecret

$block: WalletListResponse defines the response schema for `/wallet/list`

$ul: **next_cursor**: Cursor used for fetching e-wallets created before the latest e-wallet provided in this response
**request_id**: A unique identifier for the request, which can be used for troubleshooting. This identifier, like all Plaid identifiers, is case sensitive.
